localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: This is an app for people to find boba drinks nearby. It allows you to rate individual boba drinks, so that you don't have to read through lots of reviews to see which boba is good.
blogPost.body: This is an app for people to find boba drinks nearby. It allows you to rate individual boba drinks, so that you don't have to read through lots of reviews to see which boba is good.
blogPost.title: Bubble - App for finding and rating Boba
blogPost.author: Paul Yang

localize.description: 这是一款为人们寻找附近的波霸饮品的应用。它可以让你对各个波霸饮品进行评价，这样你就不用通过大量的评论来查看哪家波霸饮品好了。
localize.tagline: 用于寻找和评级波霸的应用程序

localize.description: 這是一款爲人們尋找附近的波霸飲品的應用。它可以讓你對各個波霸飲品進行評價，這樣你就不用通過大量的評論來查看哪家波霸飲品好了。
localize.tagline: 用於尋找和評級波霸的應用程序

localize.description: 🔎从1500多本书籍、课程和纪录片中发现新的想法 ⠀ 💡通过我们的5分钟小技巧快速获得智能，让你了解情况并节省时间 ⠀ 🧠旨在让学习变得有趣和难忘。

localize.description: 🔎從1500多本書籍、課程和紀錄片中發現新的想法 ⠀ 💡通過我們的5分鐘小技巧快速獲得智能，讓你瞭解情況並節省時間 ⠀ 🧠旨在讓學習變得有趣和難忘。

next.excerpt: TLDR This is a web app (+ chrome extension) that helps you summarize any piece of text into concise, easy to digest content so you can free yourself from information overload.
next.title: TLDR This - Automatically summarize any article or webpage in a click.

localize.description: TLDR这是一个网络应用（+chrome扩展），可以帮助你把任何一段文字总结成简洁、易消化的内容，让你从信息过载中解放出来。
localize.tagline: 一键自动总结任何文章或网页。

localize.description: TLDR這是一個網絡應用（+chrome擴展），可以幫助你把任何一段文字總結成簡潔、易消化的內容，讓你從信息過載中解放出來。
localize.tagline: 一鍵自動總結任何文章或網頁。
